resources.string: Please choose a bank from a menu.
Members of Banco Popolare can withdraw money from all OTP ATMs with no fee.

Members of IMEX bank can withdraw money with no fee from MBU or MBNet ATMs of: 
BKS, 
Croatia banka, 
Erste bank, 
Istarska Kreditna Banka, 
Karlovačka banka, 
Kreditna banka Zagreb, 
Partner banka, 
Podravska banka, 
Sberbank, 
Slatinska banka, 
Veneto banka.
Members of Partner bank can withdraw money with no fee from all ATMs in MBNet system owned by Croatian banks.

Dear user,

currently, this application helps you find ATMs only in Rijeka.
Hopefully, it will expand to more cities of Croatia. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions, leave a comment on Playstore or contact us on info@jamaco-sw.com. 

Thanks for using Find my ATM!
